policies.title: 1. Data Controller
policies.description:
MyFlowCheck SRL
* Address: Calle A. Quijarro 7, Cochabamba, Bolivia
* Email: MyFlowCheck@gmail.com

policies.title: 2. Personal Data We Collect
policies.description:
We collect the following types of information:
* Registration data: Name, email, phone, and password.
* Billing data: Tax identification number (NIT), tax address.
* Usage data: Information about how you interact with our platform.
* Optional data: That you choose to provide us, such as contact references.

policies.title: 3. Purposes of Data Processing
policies.description:
Your personal data will be used to:
* Provide the services contracted on our platform.
* Manage billing and compliance with legal obligations.
* Improve your user experience through personalization.
* Send information about promotions, always with your prior consent.

policies.title: 4. Legal Basis for Data Processing
policies.description:
The processing of your personal data is carried out based on:
* Express consent: Granted when registering or using our service.
* Compliance with legal obligations: In compliance with current Bolivian regulations.
* Execution of a contract: Necessary to provide our services.

policies.title: 5. Data Sharing
policies.description:
We may share your personal data with third parties, such as:
* Technology and cloud storage service providers.
* Government entities when required by law.
* In all cases, we guarantee that these third parties comply with high data protection standards.

policies.title: 6. International Data Transfers
policies.description: Although our main base is in Bolivia, some providers may be located in other countries. When international data transfers are made, we guarantee that adequate protection measures are implemented in accordance with applicable regulations.

policies.title: 7. Data Security
policies.description: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or improper disclosure. However, no security measure is completely infallible, so we recommend protecting your password and not sharing sensitive information unnecessarily.

policies.title: 8. Your Rights
policies.description:
In accordance with Bolivian legislation, you have the right to:
* Access: Request information about the data we store about you.
* Rectification: Correct incorrect or incomplete data.
* Cancellation: Request the deletion of your data, except when there is a legal obligation to retain it.
* Opposition: Reject the processing of your data for certain purposes.
* You can exercise these rights by contacting us at MyFlowCheck@gmail.com, indicating your full name, identity document, and the right you wish to exercise.

policies.title: 9. Data Retention
policies.description: We retain your personal data only for the time necessary to fulfill the described purposes, or as required by current legislation.

policies.title: 10. Modifications to this Policy
policies.description:
We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. We will notify any changes through our platform or by email.
Thank you for trusting MyFlowCheck. Your privacy is essential to us.

conditions.title: Conditions of Use

* The exchange, promotion, or sale of illegal narcotic substances is strictly prohibited.
* No illegal explicit content will be tolerated, including but not limited to incitement to violence, hatred, harassment, or discrimination.
* It is not permitted to offer or request any type of firearms or bladed weapons through this web service.
* All users must respect copyright and not upload, share, or distribute digital content that is not authorized by its copyright holders.

* In addition to the restrictions mentioned above, users must comply with all applicable local, national, and international laws and regulations while using this web service.
* Failure to comply with any of these conditions of use may result in the suspension or deletion of your account and the taking of legal action as appropriate.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: MyFlowCheck was born out of the need for an accessible, simple, and affordable QMS (Quality Management System) that helps businesses improve their processes and entrepreneurs digitize their operations with ease.
history.paragraph2: It was created by two young visionaries: a Bolivian and a Belgian, who joined forces after observing how challenging it was for many businesses to implement effective quality systems and manage their growth digitally.
history.paragraph3: The name "MyFlowCheck" reflects the agility, accessibility, and simplicity with which any organization can professionalize its processes and maintain control in one place.

who-we-are.mision: To deliver an easy-to-use and affordable QMS platform that helps businesses organize their processes, ensure compliance, and scale sustainably, all in one place.
who-we-are.vision: To become a global reference for accessible and practical QMS solutions, empowering companies of all sizes to digitize, optimize, and continuously improve their operations.
